version_description:
> Fixed GameCenter login dialog button not working on start

====== Changes From 1.0.2 =====
> Character select screen for new players
> Added more snowboards
> Added custom character VO!
> Boosting for half a second before jumps now increases your jump height!
> Added rare diamonds to mystery boxes

> Player data syncing fix
> Fixed issue with some multirun challenges not completing

====== Changes From 1.0.3 and 1.0.2 =====
> Fixed GameCenter login dialog button not working on start
> Character select screen for new players
> Added more snowboards
> Added custom character VO!
> Boosting for half a second before jumps now increases your jump height!
> Added rare diamonds to mystery boxes

==== Hit the slopes before spring comes! ====

> Added new character VO
> Improved tree spawning
> Improved trick rotation
> Multiplayer is now available to all users

> Lowered movement sensitivity
> Added setting to adjust movement sensitivity

> Lowered movement sensitivity
> Added setting to adjust movement sensitivity
